net.joala.image.impl

Class DefaultBufferedImageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.joala.image.impl.DefaultBufferedImageBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BufferedImageBuilder, ImageBuilder<BufferedImage>

    @Named
public class DefaultBufferedImageBuilder
extends Object
implements BufferedImageBuilder

    Default implementation of the image builder.

    Since:
    2013-02-19
